title: core
text:
say_hello

 say_hello (to)

Say hello to somebody

say_hello("Isaac")

'Hello Isaac!'





HelloSayer

 HelloSayer (to)

Say hello to to using say_hello


HelloSayer.say

 HelloSayer.say ()

Do the saying

o = HelloSayer("Alexis")
o.say()

'Hello Alexis!'

title: nbdev_tutorial
text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.
